comprehensive_overview: Py-GSD is a Python library for reading and writing General Simulation Data files. It provides a high-level, Pythonic interface to the GSD file format, making it easier for users to manipulate and analyze simulation data in Python.
core_features:
1. Reading and writing General Simulation Data (GSD) files
2. High-level Pythonic interface
3. Simplifies manipulation and analysis of simulation data
